txt.en: Gathered flowers for Eshtali's tomb ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Speak with Mizâdi when you are ready to leave.
Gather flowers outside Kûr Anzar for Mizâdi's husband, Eshtali. You can find these flowers growing in the hills outside the back gate to the tower of Kûr Anzar.
Bring the flowers to Mizâdi near the tower of Kûr Anzar.
'Let us be on our way then to Esh-kimâkhi.'
Speak with Mizâdi near the tower of Kûr Anzar
Speak with Mizâdi near the tower of Kûr Anzar.
Gather flowers for Eshtali's tomb ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Speak with Mizâdi near the tower of Kûr Anzar
Gather flowers outside Kûr Anzar for Mizâdi's husband, Eshtali. You can find these flowers growing in the hills outside the back gate to the tower of Kûr Anzar.

'I appreciated your company this day. I trust you will not repeat anything you heard today to anyone. This burden... this burden is not so great when it can be shared, even if for a moment. Thank you.'
Mizâdi has asked for your company in a visit to the grave of her husband, Eshtali.
Gathered flowers for Eshtali's tomb ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Gather flowers for Eshtali's tomb ([placeholder]/[placeholder])

'I would ask you for your company in a personal matter, [placeholder]. I will be visiting my husband's tomb today, to lay fresh flowers upon it. I wonder if you would accompany me, I could do with some fellowship.\n\n'If you're willing, gather me some white flowers outside of Kûr Anzar. You will notice them by their striking petals, and strong fragrance. They were Eshtali's favourite flower, and mine.'
Flowers for Eshtali
Bring the flowers to Mizâdi near the tower of Kûr Anzar
'These are lovely, thank you. Are you ready to leave for Esh-kimâkhi?'
Speak with Mizâdi when you are ready to leave

'I appreciated your company this day. I trust you will not repeat anything you heard today to anyone.\n\n'This burden... this burden is not so great when it can be shared, even if for a moment. Thank you.'
